venue.name: Tavern in the Square - Central Square

item.description:
Let's cross the river to Cambridge. Join me for a drink or two at Tavern in the Square. We'll go to the Central Square location.

I'll email my cell phone # on Wednesday, October 28th around 4pm to the people who respond yes or maybe.

I'll get there around 5:45pm / 6pm (ish) and stay for a couple of hours.

There will be no group tab. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go. We'll hang out in the bar / lounge area. There is no reservation. People arrive and leave at various times.

Take the red line to Central Sq. There's also plenty of street parking and parking lots in the area.

Check out their website for directions, menu, etc:

http://www.taverninth...

See ya then!

This will be my last happy hour as assistant organizer. Starting next week, I will have too many commitments in the evenings, for several months, so I need to focus on that. So, come on out to say bye!

Cheers!

- Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll email my cell phone # to the people who respond yes or maybe.
item.name: Happy Hour at Tavern in the Sq (Central Square)
